title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt.

Observed Behavior:
- The first time I select the item, it doesn't get selected.

Expected Behavior:
- The item should be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Notes: The second time I select the item, it can be selected normally.
OB: The first time I select the item, it doesn't get selected.
EB: The item should be selected on the first attempt.
SR: Open the library outline view and attempt to select any item.
